p: Furthermore, if we want to enhance the efficacy of the vaccine we should combine the inactivated virus with a good adjuvant. The adjuvant might contain saponins of Quillaja saponaria Molina, which induce antibodies of desired subtypes, promote both the cytotoxic antiviral CD8 + and CD4 + Th1 cell responses against the infection and that been used with success in vaccines against leishmaniasis ( 7, 27, 28), cancer ( 29), Malaria ( 30), Herpes zoster ( 31), and HIV ( 32).
